statusHistory.description: Kamabakka Kingdom continues to operate as a community and later Revolutionary Army base

affiliations.description: Momoiro Island becomes a Revolutionary Army base after Baltigo is destroyed

baseOfOperations.description: The entire island of Momoiro Island serves as the kingdom's territory

goals: Maintain a community for those with 'hearts of maidens'
Practice and teach Okama Kenpo and Newkama Kenpo martial arts

keyEvents.title: Kamabakka Kingdom Debuts
keyEvents.description: The Kamabakka Kingdom is revealed when its okama residents chase Sanji, attempting to convert him to their culture and way of life.
keyEvents.significance: First appearance of the Kamabakka Kingdom, introducing a unique organization that will later be revealed as connected to the Revolutionary Army.

abilities.description: A unique martial art practiced by the okama of Kamabakka Kingdom
An advanced form of martial arts developed in the Kamabakka Kingdom

reputation: Known as a paradise for those with 'hearts of maidens', though considered a nightmare by Sanji

formationHistory.formationCircumstances: The kingdom's exact formation date is unknown, but it has existed as a community for okama on Momoiro Island

historicalSignificance: The Kamabakka Kingdom serves as an important Revolutionary Army base and training ground. It's where Sanji spends the two-year timeskip, developing enhanced combat abilities through constant evasion of the pursuing okama.

secrets.secret: The kingdom later becomes a Revolutionary Army base under Emporio Ivankov's leadership

culturalPractices: Attempting to convert newcomers to okama culture
Maintaining a pink, feminine aesthetic throughout the island
trivia: The name 'Kamabakka' is a play on Japanese words related to cross-dressing
Sanji's constant evasion of the okama during his two years here leads to his development of Sky Walk
The kingdom's culture clash with Sanji provides much of the comedic relief during the timeskip period
